list_definition.definition: right or appropriate for a purpose or occasion

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I haven’t any suitable shoes for the wedding
Those shoes are not suitable for walking in the country
Many people applied for the job but not one of them was suitable.
We must find a suitable day for our meeting.
